profileAlternative.name: Leodanis Pozo Ramos
profileAlternative.headline: Python Developer and Author
profileAlternative.summary: I'm Leodanis, an Industrial Engineering (Technological University of Havana, Cuba), and a Python Developer. I've been learning/using Python for 5+ years. I'm also an author and a proud member of the realpython.com Tutorial Team. I'm looking for an Entry Level Position as Python Dev or I can write Python articles for your site.
